PROBLEM STATEMENT
 Make a Boat(DC motors) that possess both forward and backward movement which navigates the given arena within minimum time .

RULES AND REGULATIONS
 • A team should consist of a minimum of 2 and a maximum of 5 members.
 • The maximum dimensions of the boat should not exceed 50x25 cms and minimum dimensions should be of 30x15 cms ( dimensions include propellers and rudder)
 • The hull of the boat shall not be readymde. ( propellers can be ready made)
 Voltage difference between two points shall not exceed 12v.  All the teams will be given a time slot for practice before the event.
 Participants using the track at any other time than the given time slot will not be entertained.  The decision of the organizing team is final.
  Any modifications in the rules will be informed to the registered teams through mails.
 • In case the bot is wireless, the teams have to submit the remotes before the start of event. Remotes will be given to the team at time of their turn.

Note : the rules may be subjected to changes, the participants are thus asked to check the website regularly.
